name: Millet Idly
itemsreq: Millet 3 cups (Any millet of your choice)
method: Grind urad dal and methi first
Mix everything together and add salt
Ferment for a minimum of 6 hours

name: Millet Vadai
method: Wash and soak millet and dal for 3 hours and drain the water
Blend millet and dal with chillies, ginger and hing
Grind coarsely. ( do not add more water)
Add chopped greens and salt along with the grounded batter
Take small portion of the batter and make round shape and drop it in the Preheated oil one by one
Cook in medium flame and wait till it becomes browning and cooked inside
